title: Need 2 last T207s for 2014 any help out there??
author: frohme

posts.post_title: Need 2 last T207s for 2014 any help out there??
posts.post_content:
Thanks to many folks on the board, my previously posted want list is nearly filled (and then some). Down to two cards needed - picking these two up in 2014 would cap the year:  Grade is - honestly - not important in the least ... would like the back to be readable, though:

Looking for two cards:

  * Livingston - "Big C" - Recruit, Factory 606.  I used to own a copy and traded it away about 4 years ago ... would be nice to get a copy back.
  * Bushelman - Broadleaf.  SGC 40+ would be great, but I'll take *anything*

I have plenty to trade (T207's mostly), and cash if there's nothing of interest.

Hope to hear from someone so I can close out the year with a sigh of relief ... this is a monkey I'd like to have done with ...

Thanks!
--
Mike
